column1: # This file specifies which taxon's reads should be mapped to which genomes. The taxon is an organism for
# which you wish to validate the air filter signal (Kraken 2 classification), and the genome is a suitable
# reference genome for that organism. You may specify multiple genomes for a single tax_id, just add more
# tax_id: ----- The taxonomic ID of the taxon, must be an integer
# name: ------- The name that you wish to identify the taxon/reference combination with.
#               For example the scientific name of the taxon. Alphanumericals, spaces,
#               Spaces will be replaced with underscores (_) in filenames and paths.
# fasta_file: - The full filename of the reference sequence file in the supporting_files/genomes directory.
